preferences.notes: Needs reliable Wi‑Fi and power outlets nearby because Pranav may review some performance traces on his laptop after dinner.

success_criteria.notes: Success if the assistant makes a reservation via make_reservation at one of the seeded North Indian restaurants in Pune for 3 people on the final agreed date (shift from Saturday 2025-12-13 to Sunday 2025-12-14 after the user changes their mind) between 19:30 and 21:30 local time, and explicitly confirms indoor seating and Wi‑Fi availability.

injected_behaviors.instructions: After the assistant proposes options for Saturday 2025-12-13, change the preference to Sunday 2025-12-14 because a last-minute production kernel patch deployment gets scheduled on Saturday evening. Keep the same time window and party size.

persona.name: Pranav Desai
persona.bio: Pranav Desai is a systems software engineer who spends most of his time digging into Linux internals, kernel logs, and memory traces to understand how operating systems really behave under pressure. He loves profiling apps, experimenting with different paging and caching strategies, and explaining concepts like virtual memory and TLBs in a way that junior devs can actually use. Outside of work, he tinkers with old laptops, runs his own homelab, and writes long technical blog posts about performance trade-offs.
persona.writing_style: friendly, technical, slightly informal, uses precise terminology and concrete examples, often adds short clarifications in parentheses
sample_messages: Can you send me the exact RAM size and what OS build you’re on? I want to reproduce the memory pressure before we blame the VM settings.
This looks like it’s thrashing the page file, not a pure CPU issue. Mind if I grab some perf and vmstat output from your machine tomorrow?
Yep, that explanation makes sense. Let’s still benchmark with swap off vs a capped swap file so we can see how much the virtual memory overhead is actually costing us.

messages.output_raw: I want to book a restaurant in Pune for dinner.

5. Make the reservation and share the confirmation details.
